title: Replace navbar logo with user-provided image

requirements.summary: Replace the current logo in Navbar and Footer with the user-provided logo image from generated assets
acceptanceCriteria: The Navbar displays the user-provided logo image instead of the previous logo.
The Footer displays the same user-provided logo image for consistency.
The logo image is loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo renders correctly at its intended display size without distortion or unwanted cropping.

file_operations.description: Update the logo source to use the user-provided image at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-main.dim_320x80.png. Replace any existing logo element or text with an img element that references this generated asset. Ensure the logo maintains appropriate sizing and aspect ratio for the navbar layout.

Update the brand logo to use the same user-provided image at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-main.dim_320x80.png. Replace any existing logo element or text with an img element that references this generated asset. Ensure the logo maintains appropriate sizing and aspect ratio for the footer layout, matching the Navbar implementation for consistency.
